item.title: Trace the data structure of Blender and extract the vertex coordinates from fbx
item.description: Using Blender, I created a script that extracts only the vertex coordinates from the FBX data and arranges it, so I will introduce it after explanation. Blender data structure First of all, about this figure (initial state) that you are familiar with. By the way, the 3D view of Blender is managed as follows. In Python script bpy.context.scene.collection It is a place to hit. This is the GUI here.
